info.title: HybridNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used by publishers to on-board offerings and manage network functions.

get.description: Gets information of the network function definition groups under a publisher.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting networkFunctionDefinition group resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a specified network function definition group.

202.description: Accepted. Sets provisioningState to 'Deleting' until the operation is completed. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

204.description: Request is successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a network function definition group.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update publisher network function definition group operation.

200.description: Creation or update is successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkFunctionDefinitionGroup sub resource.

201.description: Created. The operation returns the resulting NetworkFunctionDefinitionGroup sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified networkFunctionDefinition group.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting publisher network function definition group resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates a network function definition group resource.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update publisher network function definition group operation.

200.description: Creation or update is successful. The operation returns the resulting network function definition group resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the preview subscriptions of a network function definition group.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the preview subscription list.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation deleted the preview subscription resource.

202.description: Request is accepted. The operation is deleting the preview subscription resource.

204.description: Request is successful. The preview subscription resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates preview subscription resource.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update publisher preview subscription operation.

201.description: Request is accepted. The operation is updating or creating the preview subscription resource.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation updated the preview subscription resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the preview subscription resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update publisher preview subscription operation.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation updated the preview subscription resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified network function definition version.

202.description: Accepted. Sets provisioningState to 'Deleting' until the operation is completed. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

204.description: Request is successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a network function definition version.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update network function definition version operation.

200.description: Creation or update is successful. The operation returns the resulting network function definition sub resource.

201.description: Created. The operation returns the resulting network function definition sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a network function definition version.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkFunctionDefinitionVersion resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates a network function definition version resource.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update network function definition version operation.

200.description: Creation or update is successful. The operation returns the resulting network function definition sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a list of network function definition versions under a network function definition group.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkFunctionDefinitionVersion resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Update network function definition version state.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update the state of network function definition version.

200.description: The updated network function definition version state.

202.description: The request of updating network function definition version state is accepted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Get information about helm package versions in network function definition version overview.

parameters.name: artifactParameters
parameters.description: Post body parameters for list application versions API.

200.description: Request is successful. The operations returns the list of application versions.

202.description: Request of getting list of helm chart versions is accepted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Get information about artifacts in a helm package in network function definition version overview.

parameters.name: artifactParameters
parameters.description: Post body parameters for list artifacts API.

200.description: Request is successful. The operations returns the list of artifacts.

202.description: Request of getting list of images is accepted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
